attributes.action: Say no to forced mandatory vaccines for social care staff
attributes.additional_details: Do not make me the covid vaccine mandatory for health care staff this is a invasion of human rights and taking away the choice of the individual and is in breech with the Nuremberg code
attributes.background: Do not make covid vaccine mandatory for social care staff

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577842
